sqlMap.select: SELECT t.commentid, t.commentrefid, t.productid, t.userid, t.content, t.collectid, t.commentstate, t.likesum, t.replysum, t.fundcode, t.commenttype, DATE_FORMAT(t.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS createtime, u.nickname, u.loginemail, u.picpath, u.socialpicpath, u.memo AS usermemo, u.usergroup, u.position FROM t_next_comment t LEFT JOIN t_next_user u ON t.userid = u.userid WHERE t.productid = #productid# ORDER BY t.createTime DESC
